title: Announcement: CitR x disco naïveté present DARK PARADISE @ SXSW
content:
We’re beyond proud to announce the most exciting moment in CitR’s existence to date.

Teaming up with blog-brother disco naïveté, we’re delighted to present DARK PARADISE, an unofficial day party at SXSW in Austin, Texas, featuring a host of our favourite new artists. Having provided a digital platform for many of them, it’s fantastic to be able to offer them a stage upon which to impress at the finest new music festival in the world. Taking place at BD Riley’s, 204 East 6th Street on Wednesday 13th March, from 12pm-6pm, we also have to thank MailChimp for their generous involvement.

So without further ado, CitR x disco naïveté are delighted to present: DARK PARADISE

STARRING:

S O H N

Eddi Front

Pacific Air

Young Dreams

Mozart’s Sister

NO

GEMS

DENA (dj)

Entry is free, and a SXSW badge/wristband is not required, however the venue may reach capacity, in which case it will be one in, one out.

Attending SXSW has always been a dream of mine (and Ben’s) and to not only be able to go but to host such a brilliant roster of acts, is quite simply unbelievable. To confirm your attendance, simply RSVP below, or head over to the Facebook event page. See you in Austin!
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
